tool.name: tool_15

param.name: MODE
param.dialogReference:
Neighbourhood

Choice

Available Choices:

[0] Neumann

[1] Moore

Default: 0

Neumann: the four horizontally and vertically neighboured cells; Moore: all eight adjacent cells

param.name: THRESHOLD
param.dialogReference:
Minimum Threshold

Integer

Minimum: 2

Default: 4

Minimum number of cells in a group of adjacent cells.

param.name: ALL
param.dialogReference:
Class Selection

Choice

Available Choices:

[0] single class

[1] all classes

Default: 1

tool.summary: The 'Sieve Classes' tool counts the number of adjacent cells sharing the same value (the class identifier). Areas that are formed by less cells than specified by the threshold will be removed (sieved), i.e. they are set to no-data.
